Description: Xplora Technologies AS is a Norway-based platform and services company, and an industry provider in the children's smartwatch market. Xplora's aim is to give children a safe introduction to a digital life, as well as a better balance between screen time and physical activity. The Company's vision is to facilitate children around the world to experience how their daily activities can create value and make a positive difference. Xploraâ€™s offer includes such smartwatches as XGO3, X5 Play, XGO2 and XMOVE, as well as watch accessories, such as screen protectors, chargers, and power banks. Xplora Technologies AS has offices in Norway, Sweden, Finland, Denmark, United Kingdom, Germany, Spain and in the United States.
